markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dancing Lamentation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2000)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 240 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This toxin erratically stimulates the limbs, forcing unexpected shifts in momentum. The result resembles a gangly, lurching dance. At the start of each turn, the victim takes one or more Steps in a random direction if able. This movement is [forced](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) and doesn't count against the victim's actions for the round. 

**Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 poison damage and 1 Step of forced movement (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and 1 Step of forced movement (1 round); **Stage 3** 8d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, 2 Steps of forced movement (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dancing Lamentation
